banner.title: Ninjas in the Machine Inc. Specializing in government contracting services for local, state, and federal agencies and organizations.

coreCompetencies.description: NITM specializes in product management, development, consulting, and team building for complex and deep-tech solutions across various industries and verticals including Healthcare, EdTech, AI, SaaS, Data, HIPAA compliance, and more.

items.description: Experts at collaboratively developing solutions with minimal information
Excellent communication and planning skills leading to 100% customer satisfaction from start to finish
Strong dedication to acknowledging issues within an hour and resolving critical needs and problems within 12 hours with sliding scales of responsiveness depending on the nature of any issue
